title: Biolibrary
description: Schema for submitting a molecular library.

internal_ID.title: Internal ID
internal_ID.description: ID used internally to identify this biospecimen.
internal_ID.comment: Only admins are allowed to set or update this value.

biospecimen.title: biospecimen
biospecimen.description: The biospecimen that nucleic acid was isolated from to generate the library.

biological_replicate_number.title: Biological replicate
biological_replicate_number.description: Data collection under the same methods using a different biological source, measuring the variability in the biological source.

technical_replicate_number.title: Technical replicate
technical_replicate_number.description: Data collection under the same methods using the same biological source, measuring the variability in the method.

nucleic_acid_term_name.title: Library material
nucleic_acid_term_name.description: SO (Sequence Ontology) term best matching the molecule isolated to generate the library (e.g. 'RNA' for a total RNA library, even if that library is subsequently reverse transcribed for DNA sequencing.)

nucleic_acid_quantity.title: Nucleic acid starting quantity
nucleic_acid_quantity.description: The starting amount of nucleic acid before selection and purification.

nucleic_acid_quantity_units.title: Nucleic acid starting quantity units
nucleic_acid_quantity_units.description: The units used for starting amount of nucleic acid.

date_sent.title: Date sent
date_sent.description: The date that the nucleic acid was sent for sequencing.

construction_platform.title: Platform
construction_platform.description: The device used to construct the library.
construction_platform.comment: Use in cases of automated/proprietary library preparation (Fluidigm, 10X, etc.)

source.title: Source
source.description: The vendor, for nucleic acids or proteins purchased directly from a vendor (e.g. total RNA).

documents.description: Protocols or other documents that describe library construction and sample treatment before sequencing.

extraction_method.title: Extraction method
extraction_method.description: A short description or reference of the nucleic acid extraction protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.

fragmentation_methods.title: Fragmentation methods
fragmentation_methods.description: A list of nucleic acid fragmentation methods and restriction enzymes used in library preparation.

items.title: Fragmentation method
items.description: A short description or reference of the nucleic acid fragmentation protocol used in library preparation.

fragmentation_date.title: Fragmentation date
fragmentation_date.description: The date that the nucleic acid was fragmented. The date applies to all fragmentation methods specified.
fragmentation_date.comment: Date can be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD (TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).

library_size_selection_method.title: Size selection method
library_size_selection_method.description: A short description or reference of the size selection protocol used in library preparation, if applicable.

lysis_method.title: Lysis method
lysis_method.description: A short description or reference of the cell lysis protocol used in library preparation, if applicable

size_range.title: Size range
size_range.description: The measured size range of the purified nucleic acid, in bp.

strand_specificity.title: Strand specific
strand_specificity.description: The preparation of the library uses a strand-specific protocol.
